name: Fatima

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

resume.tagline: I'm a web designer, researcher, project manager
resume.description:
Technological University Dublin | Dublin, Ireland (October 2022 - Present) PhD. 
studentship - SFI D-real

experiences.position: HPAL- Elect Elect Engineering Dept  - Technological University Dublin
experiences.bullets: Assist in the teaching of server-side web development  Mentored the third year students on Internship: Introduced Web development to the  students and supported them in developing a physical web application used for  Revealing Grangegorman and Stoneybatter Festival events. Developed and managed  social media posts during these events. Wrote paper on the technology used for the  events and users enagagement/ awaiting reviews of the paper.

experiences.position: Phd Researcher- Elect Elect Engineering Dept - Technological University Dublin
experiences.bullets: Recruited older adults for my study from different older adults organisations.  Conducted multiple focus group workshops with older adults invited to Grangegorman campus.  Presented abstract on the proposed study at the 2023 AAATE. (Badmosa, F., Berrya, D., & Murphyb, E.  (2023). Co-design of an Interactive Wellness Park: Ideating Designs for a Multimodal Outdoor Physical Web Installation.  In Book of Abstracts (p. 214)  Analysed the qualitative data collected using NVIVO  Wrote the result of the data collected for 2 publications /awaiting papersâ€™ reviews

experiences.position: St. John of God Liffey Service/ Digital Assistive Technology Facilitator/Researcher

education.universityPara: I was the Team leader for the thesis on Evaluation of an E-commerce website with two  other students. My responsibilities included:  Planning and coordination: I was responsible for developing a plan to evaluate the  website's usability, including defining the scope of the evaluation, identifying the target  audience, and coordinating with team members and stakeholders to ensure a smooth and  efficient evaluation process.  Research Output: Conducted mixed method research for my thesis: title evaluation of a  ecommerce website: Rukasplace website.
